DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , double-dummy , placebo-controlled , three-arm trial conduct United States , Europe , Asia . Approximately 150 eligible KRAS-mutant metastatic colorectal cancer subject fail first line fluoropyrimidine oxaliplatin-based regimen without anti-VEGF therapy randomize 1:1:1 ratio receive AMG 479 placebo plus AMG 655 FOLFIRI , AMG 479 plus AMG 655 placebo FOLFIRI , AMG 479 placebo plus AMG 655 placebo FOLFIRI
DOC.brief_title: QUILT-2.018 : Safety & Efficacy FOLFIRI With AMG 479 AMG 655 v FOLFIRI Alone KRAS-mutant Metastatic Colorectal Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma colon rectum patient metastatic disease Mutanttype KRAS tumor screen Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status 0 1 Adequate hematology , renal , hepatic , coagulation function History know presence central nervous system metastases History malignancy Prior irinotecanbased chemotherapy advanced/metastatic disease Prior death receptor agonist , systemic IGF1R agonist set Uncontrolled cardiovascular disease
